about.title: About us
about.description1: We offer a fast, safe and easy-to-use platform where you can find bus tickets at the best prices.
about.description2: We work with trusted operators, constantly update schedules and provide real support when you need it.
about.description3: With us, your journey begins stress-free in just a few clicks!
about.features_title: Plan your trips easier, faster and more conveniently!

feature1.title: Best price guarantee
feature1.description: We constantly check partner rates to offer you the best bus ticket prices.

feature2.title: Fast and simple booking
feature2.description: Our platform is intuitive, works on any device and lets you easily choose your preferred route.

feature3.title: Real support when you need it
feature3.description: Whether you have a question or made a mistake in a booking, our support team responds promptly!

booking.buy_ticket_slogan: Buy a bus ticket online easily!
booking.additional_info: Regular trips, comfortable minibuses, and flexible schedules!

planning.title: Plan your perfect trip!
planning.subtitle: Search and buy tickets for the most popular routes

reservation.title: Reserve a seat!
reservation.subtitle: The most popular route right now

subscription.title: Stay updated on new routes, discounts, and special offers. Subscribe to ARIC news and plan your trips easier, faster, and more conveniently.

customer_feedback.title: What do customers say about our trips?

discount_offer.title: Discount!
discount_offer.description: Buy a round-trip ticket and get a discount on the second one!

contacts.title: Contact us.
contacts.subtitle: We are here to help you!

footer.title: Book your seat easily and enjoy a safe and comfortable journey. Modern minibuses, flexible schedules, and fast online booking – everything you need for a smooth trip.
footer.address: Republic of Moldova, mun. Chișinău, Calea Basarabiei 26

email_subscription.title: Receive discount notifications!
email_subscription.description: Plan your trips easier, faster, and more conveniently.

auth.email_prompt: Please enter the email address where we will send your tickets.
auth.phone_prompt: We will send a one-time password to your mobile number
